peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Mengel furniture still in business?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: MENGEL continues to develop new products as well as bespoke custom-made furniture for commercial and private projects.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: About - MENGEL

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I find out how much my old furniture is worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The best way to determine its worth is to bring it to a professional antique furniture appraiser who has specific knowledge of antique furniture pieces and knows all the period, material and style details that impact its value.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How Much is Your Antique Furniture Worth? | Appraisal Guide

peopleAlsoAsk.question: When was Mengel furniture made?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Mengel Furniture was founded in 1877 by C.C. Mengel in Louisville, Kentucky. They manufactured household furnishings, wooden washing machines, and wooden boxes using lumber from the mills they also operated in Central and South America.
